Fall 2018, Block 2 — MA220

Overview

  • Class: Monday through Friday, 9:15–11:45, in Tutt Science 229.
  • Instructor: Shishir Agrawal (I also go by Sunny).
    • LA: Haley Colgate.
    • Paraprof: Bob Kuo.
  • Course syllabus.
  • Textbook: Hefferon, Linear Algebra, 3rd edition.
    • Textbook and solutions are available online.
    • See also: a running list of errata.
  • For help outside of class, see below for Sunny’s office hours (in Tutt Science 234) and for problem sessions with Haley and Bob. Also, check the tutoring schedule for the QRC.
  • Reading assignment submission form (class is over, link disabled).

  1. You might find this topic quite challenging, but it’s also really important to get down. I’ve assigned a lot of exercises to help with this. If you can understand what’s going on with matrix representations, you’ll have a much easier time when we discuss change of basis and diagonalization next week!↩︎

  2. There are a few extra problems in these slides that we did not get to in class. I left them in the slides in case you wanted more practice.↩︎
